item.title: Initiative One - Multiplayer Game
item.description: Objective In under one week, my team of 5 students developed a multiplayer cooperative game called “Initiative One”. The theme of the game jam was “Cooperition” meaning a combination of “competition” and “cooperation”. The game also needed to relate to STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Math). Summary “Initiative One” emphasized “cooperation” by allowing up to 4 players to work together to research a planet. The researchers scan plants, animals, crystals, ore, and water to learn more about the planet.
